markdownRemark.excerpt: I can highlight   with CSS syntax.
markdownRemark.html:
I can highlight .some-class { background-color: red } with CSS syntax.

(

// a simple chorus
SynthDef(\voice, { arg outbus=10, freq=400, dutycycle=0.75, bpf1_freq=2240, bpf2_freq=870,bpf3_freq=300;

	var sig = Pulse.ar(freq,dutycycle);
	var bpf1 = BPF.ar(sig, bpf1_freq);
	var bpf2 = BPF.ar(sig, bpf2_freq);
	var bpf3 = BPF.ar(sig, bpf3_freq);
	var mix = Mix.new([ bpf1 , bpf2 , bpf3]);
	Out.ar(outbus, mix)
}).add;

)

frontmatter.title: Human Aided Music
frontmatter.description: A musical and pictorial journey of beautiful soundscapes and fantastic nature that leads to a peaceful contemplation.
